[EPT-DISSIM] 1. 데이터정리

Author

신록예찬

Published

August 8, 2023

import pandas as pd

1. load raw-data

df = pd.read_csv("https://media.githubusercontent.com/media/miruetoto/yechan3/main/posts/3_Researches/YECHAN/EPT_DISSIM/india.csv")
df

4116 rows × 19 columns

2. make it as tidydata

df = df.drop(['ANNUAL', 'Jan-Feb', 'Mar-May','Jun-Sep', 'Oct-Dec'],axis=1)\
.set_index(['SUBDIVISION','YEAR'])\
.stack().reset_index().rename({'level_2':'MONTH',0:'PRECIPITATION'},axis=1)
df
SUBDIVISION YEAR MONTH PRECIPITATION
0 ANDAMAN & NICOBAR ISLANDS 1901 JAN 49.2
1 ANDAMAN & NICOBAR ISLANDS 1901 FEB 87.1
2 ANDAMAN & NICOBAR ISLANDS 1901 MAR 29.2
3 ANDAMAN & NICOBAR ISLANDS 1901 APR 2.3
4 ANDAMAN & NICOBAR ISLANDS 1901 MAY 528.8
... ... ... ... ...
49317 LAKSHADWEEP 2015 AUG 146.4
49318 LAKSHADWEEP 2015 SEP 160.4
49319 LAKSHADWEEP 2015 OCT 165.4
49320 LAKSHADWEEP 2015 NOV 231.0
49321 LAKSHADWEEP 2015 DEC 159.0

49322 rows × 4 columns

3. mutate MONTH column

mapp = {l:i for i,l in enumerate(df.MONTH.unique().tolist(),start=1)}
mapp
{'JAN': 1,
 'FEB': 2,
 'MAR': 3,
 'APR': 4,
 'MAY': 5,
 'JUN': 6,
 'JUL': 7,
 'AUG': 8,
 'SEP': 9,
 'OCT': 10,
 'NOV': 11,
 'DEC': 12}
df = df.assign(MONTH = df.MONTH.apply(lambda x: mapp[x]))
df
SUBDIVISION YEAR MONTH PRECIPITATION

1 ANDAMAN & NICOBAR ISLANDS 1901 2 87.1
2 ANDAMAN & NICOBAR ISLANDS 1901 3 29.2
3 ANDAMAN & NICOBAR ISLANDS 1901 4 2.3
4 ANDAMAN & NICOBAR ISLANDS 1901 5 528.8
... ... ... ... ...

49318 LAKSHADWEEP 2015 9 160.4
49319 LAKSHADWEEP 2015 10 165.4
49320 LAKSHADWEEP 2015 11 231.0
49321 LAKSHADWEEP 2015 12 159.0

49322 rows × 4 columns

4. create a new YM column from YEAR and MONTH

df = df.assign(YM = pd.Series([str(y)+'-'+str(m) for y,m in zip(df.YEAR,df.MONTH)]).apply(pd.to_datetime))
df

5. save dataframe as india_tidy.csv

df.to_csv('india_tidy.csv',index=False)
